body:
Hi!
> I have downloaded and installed the Windows version of Evalglare but 
> am not sure whether the software has actually been installed. Is there 
> a way to check whether the software has been installed? Also, are 
> there any user manuals and/or tutorials for Evalglare?


I never tried evalglare on Windows. I was not even aware that it 
existed. On Linux, it comes as an archive, and the documentation is 
included as a pdf document.


There is no GUI for evalglar, as it simply processes rendered image 
files. Did you try if it is in your PATH already by just typing 
'evalglar' at the command line? How did you install it?


CU Lars.
___
